00011 #include "Jamoma.h"
00012 #include "QueueRamp.h"
00013 
00014 // called by the Max queue, and provided to the qelem -- needs to have a C interface
00015 void queueramp_qfn(QueueRamp *x)
00016 {
00017         x->tick();
00018 }
00019 
00020 
00021 QueueRamp::QueueRamp(RampUnitCallback aCallbackMethod, void *aBaton)
00022         : RampUnit("ramp.queue", aCallbackMethod, aBaton)
00023 {
00024         active = 0;
00025         qelem = qelem_new(this, (method)queueramp_qfn); // install the queue element
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 QueueRamp::~QueueRamp()
00030 {
00031         qelem_unset(qelem);
00032         qelem_free(qelem);
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00036 void QueueRamp::go(TTUInt32 inNumValues, TTFloat64 *inValues, TTFloat64 time)
00037 {
00038         short i;
00039         
00040         ramptime        = time;
00041         startTime       = systime_ms();
00042         targetTime      = startTime + time;
00043 
00044         setNumValues(inNumValues);
00045         for(i=0; i<numValues; i++){
00046                 targetValue[i] = inValues[i];
00047                 startValue[i] = currentValue[i];
00048         }
00049         normalizedValue = 0.0;  // set the ramp to the beginning
00050         active = 1;
00051         qelem_set(qelem);               // Start the ramp!
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 void QueueRamp::stop()
00056 {
00057         active = 0;
00058         qelem_unset(qelem);
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 void QueueRamp::tick()
00063 {
00064         unsigned long   currentTime = systime_ms();
00065         short                   i;
00066         double                  mapped;
00067         double                  *current = currentValue;
00068         double                  *target = targetValue;
00069         double                  *start = startValue;
00070         float                   ratio;
00071         
00072         if(active){
00073                 if(currentTime > targetTime){
00074                         active = 0;
00075                         for(i=0; i < numValues; i++)
00076                                 currentValue[i] = targetValue[i];
00077                 }
00078                 else{
00079                         ratio = (currentTime - startTime) / (float)ramptime;
00080                         mapped = functionUnit->map(ratio);
00081                         for(i=0; i < numValues; i++)
00082                                 current[i] = (target[i] * mapped) + (start[i] * (1 - mapped));
00083                         qelem_set(qelem);                                                       // set the qelem element to run again
00084                 }
00085                 (callback)(baton, numValues, currentValue);             // send the value to the host
00086         }
00087 }
